result.execSummary:
The defendant Jonathon A Maxwell was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 4th Degree Sexual Assault, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.225(3m).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: GFE to obtain and maintain fulltime employment and/or school (30 hours per week) or complete 5 hours community service w/ 2 verifiable job contacts.
No contact with victim A.G.B. d.o.b. 9/14/97 or family.

Counseling or treatment.
No new charges supported by probable cause.
No sex offender registry but may be required if probation is revoked.
DNA sample w/ surcharge
Fingerprints & photographs
AMENDED: employment/school or complete 5 hours community service

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  

A copy of the police report has been faxed to the probation office.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jonathon A Maxwell

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.
Notice of court ordered financial obligations

records.addlTxt: DOC to Judge Moran for clarification of community service on JOC
w/Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief

Case Called: 3:19pm. Clerk: Denise. State appears by ADA Theresa Wetzsteon. Defendant appears prose. Matter set for Initial/Plea & Sentencing. Statements by State re: precharged conference. Crt advises defendant rights to counsel. Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed.  VRCW*. PLEA: GUILTY - ct 1 (4th deg sexual assault). COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, * def is competent to represent self: a factual basis & def guilty. COURT ORDERS:  SWH - 2 yrs probation. CONDITIONS: Counseling or Treatment; No new charges supported by probable cause; No contact with victim A.G.B. dob 9/14/97 or family; Good faith effort to obtain and maintain fulltime employment and/or school (30 hrs a week) must then complete 5 hrs CS with 2 verificable job contacts; Court Costs; No DNA Surcharge. State does not request Sex Offender Registry but may require if probation is revoked. Eligible to apply for Expungement after 2 yrs of probation. Crt makes findings re expungement. State makes statement re: DNA Sample and fingerprints and photoprints. COURT FURTHER ORDERS: DNA Sample & Surcharge; Fingerprints and Photographs.  Adj: 3:38pm.
